data.question: What is the chemical formula of the synthesized metal-organic framework?
What method was used for the synthesis of [Zn2Ca(BTC)2(H2O)2](DMF)2?
data.answer: Heating a mixture of benzene-1,3,5-tricaboxylic acid, Zn(NO3)2.6H2O, and Ca(OH)2 in DMF/H2O at 95 °C inside a Teflon-capped scintillation vial for 10 hours.

data.question: True or False: The synthesized MOF has a BET surface area of 730 m2·g−1.
What is the space group of the synthesized MOF?
What is the role of DMF in the synthesis of [Zn2Ca(BTC)2(H2O)2](DMF)2?
data.answer: DMF acts as a solvent in the synthesis process.

data.question: True or False: The synthesized MOF can adsorb water from the air immediately after being desolventized.
What is the estimated void volume percentage of the synthesized MOF?
What technique was used to confirm the purity of the synthesized MOF?
True or False: The synthesized MOF structure decomposes rapidly from 430 °C.
What is the main application of the synthesized MOF mentioned in the text?
data.answer: Capture of nerve agent surrogate methylphosphonic acid.

data.question: True or False: The synthesized MOF has coordinately unsaturated sites on its one-dimensional channel walls.
What is the role of coordinately unsaturated zinc sites in the MOF?
True or False: The synthesized MOF exhibits type-I adsorption behavior.
What is the significance of the unique metal−organic replica of the 3,6-connected α-PbO2 topological net?
data.answer: It represents the first case of metal−organic replica of 3,6-connected α-PbO2 net.

data.question: True or False: The synthesized MOF's structure can be further refined after exposure to a strong synchrotron beam.
What is the role of the nitrogen adsorption isotherm in the study of the synthesized MOF?
data.answer: It reveals the adsorption behavior and porosity of the MOF.

data.question: True or False: The synthesized MOF can extract almost all methylphosphonic acid from the solution before the mole ratio MPA/Zn reaches 0.5.
What does the high eliminating temperature of DMF indicate about the synthesized MOF?
data.answer: It indicates strong interactions between DMF molecules and the host framework.

data.question: True or False: The synthesized MOF's structure remains crystalline after activation at 300 °C for 12 hours under vacuum.
What is the significance of the calculated binding energies for MPA in the synthesized MOF?
data.answer: It helps in understanding the efficiency of MPA capture by the MOF.
